releaseNotes:
• Bug Fixes are the main reason for this update
• .AU file formats not showing drop downs has been fixed
• Mac specific crash errors have been fixed and timercallouts have been improved
• GUI scaling fixes (Some DAW wouldn't allow the plugins GUI to scale properly with the plugin window)
• Dialog boxes showing behind the plugin rather then in front (Save as, Duplicate, Advance button on Tone Shaping, Updater window)
